description: When it comes to the windbreaker line, it’s all in the name: these extremely lightweight, packable windbreaker jackets and vests will stop even the strongest summit winds from blowing you away. This generation of windbreakers not only offers an ergonomic fit, but also contain merino protect – in the front, on the back and under the arms. The fine merino fibers of this breathable, moistureregulating and windproof material noticeably optimize the body climate. The sleeves, sides and hood of the jacket are made from super lightweight, windproof tec stretch material, which perfectly mirrors your every movement. A pfc-free, water-resistant dwr coating protects against light drizzle. Practical: both the jacket and vest can be packed away in the super compact breast pocket. Minimum weight, maximum function. Wherever the adventure leads you.
name: Ortovox Windbreaker Vest - Mens
